text:
Leicester City F.C. are an English football club. They are based in Leicester in the county of Leicestershire. Leicester won the 2015–16 Premier League, their first Premier League title.
They are probably most famous for producing players like Gary Lineker and Peter Shilton. They have won 3 Football League Cups, and they hold the record for appearing in the most FA Cup finals without ever winning one. Their current manager is Brendan Rodgers.
They won the Premier League title in the 16 season.
